name: Investigation
text:
Upon receiving a report that abuse of a dependent adult has occurred and is imminent, the department shall cause an investigation to be commenced in accordance with this part as the department deems appropriate. [L 1989, c 381, pt of §1; am L 1990, c 144, §1 and c 234, §9]
 
         [Section effective July 1, 2009.  For section effective until June 30, 2009, see above.]  Upon receiving a report that abuse of a vulnerable adult has occurred or is in danger of occurring if immediate action is not taken, the department shall cause an investigation to be commenced in accordance with this part as the department deems appropriate. [L 1989, c 381, pt of §1; am L 1990, c 144, §1 and c 234, §9; am L 2008, c 154, §9]
